import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../index.css' import './NewTODOForm.css' const NewTODOForm = props => { const [enteredTitle, setEnteretTitle] = useState('') const [enteredDate, setEnteretDate] = useState('') const [enteredMessage, setEnteretMessage] = useState('') const [chosenOption1, setChosenOption1] = useState(false) const [chosenOption2, setChosenOption2] = useState(false) const [chosenOption3, setChosenOption3] = useState(false) const titleChangeHandler = event => { setEnteretTitle(event.target.value) console.log(event.target.value) } const dateChangeHandler = event => { setEnteretDate(event.target.value) } const messageChangeHandler = event => { setEnteretMessage(event.target.value) } const option1ChangeHandler = () => { setChosenOption1(true) setChosenOption2(false) setChosenOption3(false) console.log(chosenOption1) } const option2ChangeHandler = () => { setChosenOption1(true) setChosenOption2(false) setChosenOption3(false) } const option3ChangeHandler = () => { setChosenOption1(true) setChosenOption2(false) setChosenOption3(false) } return (

Title:

Date:

Category:

Message:

) } export default NewTODOForm
